LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_ClothApron.label: fabric apron
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_ClothApron.description: Pocketed apron intended for kitchen or tailoring work.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_LeatherApron.label: leather apron
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_LeatherApron.description: These kind of hardened leather aprons are used by professionals of many trades.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Longcoat.label: long coat
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Longcoat.description: A warm, stylish, and long coat for keeping the cold at bay.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_MedicalApron.label: surgeon's apron
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_MedicalApron.description: Pocketed apron intended for sterile medical work.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Poncho.label: poncho
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Poncho.description: Essentially a large sheet of fabric, the poncho is an outer garment designed to keep the body warm. Originally used by the Native American people of the Andes region, the poncho has become popular throughout South America, Mesoamerica, and the southwestern American frontier.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_TraderCoat.label: tradesman's coat
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_TraderCoat.description: A thick coat with various pockets and storage areas that is commonly used by travelling merchants and caravaneers.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Waistcoat.label: waistcoat
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Waistcoat.description: A staple piece of clothing that has a stylish look to it.
